analysis.description:
bar.Reco (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#380-386) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(bal) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#385-386)

bar.finish (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#361-379) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(multisig,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#371-374)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#374)

bar.createTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#386-390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol)

Reentrancy in bar.finish (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#361-379):
	External calls:
	- issuedTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#365-367)
	- token.mint(multisig,restrictedTokens) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#371-374)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#374)
	External calls sending eth:
	- multisig.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/29/0x1892694cdcafc62a66f6b82acd9f0980d6d0c80e.sol#375-376)
